item.title: Buttons

item.content:encoded: [vc_row css=".vc_custom_1437017025020{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;background-color: #d6d6d6 !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2" title="Text on the button"][vc_column_text]Default Primary Info Info with icon Success Warning danger Inverse Block level button[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" title="Text on the button"][vc_column_text]Large Default Large Primary Large Primary with icon Default button Default button Small button Small button Mini button Mini button[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
